title: Coinbase Soars After Reaching Cboe Surveillance Sharing Agreement for 5 Bitcoin ETF Applications
description: Shares of Coinbase jumped as much as 16% Tuesday after the crypto exchange reached an agreement with Cboe’s BZX Exchange to maintain a surveillance-sharing agreement for five of its spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) applications.

title: Brevan Howard Joins $12M Round for Liquid Staking Protocol Alluvial
description: Ethereal Ventures and Variant co-led the round for Alluvial, creator of the enterprise and institution-focused Liquid Collective.

title: Federal Prosecutors Investigate Former FTX Executive Over Possible Campaign Law Violations: WSJ
description: Ryan Salame is being investigated for potentially illegally avoiding federal limits on contributions to his girlfriend's congressional campaign last year

title: Metaverse, Web 4.0 Strategy Unveiled by European Commission

title: Crypto Market Remains in ‘Bitcoin Season’ as ‘Altcoin Season’ Drought Hits Record Two-Year Mark
description: According to data, the cryptocurrency ecosystem has endured its longest stretch without an altcoin season. So far, it has been more than two years without an altcoin season, and there have been no signals indicating one might emerge. Altcoin Season Eludes Cryptocurrency Market for 2 Years Recently, social media and cryptocurrency-related forums have been abuzz […]

title: Ankr revolutionizes Web3 with its new Ultra Sound Infrastructure
description: Since the Bitcoin boom, blockchain technology has spread to other industries, including Web3, and Ankr has profited immensely as a result. Despite the fact that Web3 infrastructure is still in its infancy, many businesses are looking into the future of databases. With that in mind, Ankr’s new Ultra Sound Infrastructure could be a game-changer for ... Read more

title: BRICS Nations to Introduce Gold-Backed Currency, Fueling Speculation of Dollar Challenge; Bitcoin Keeps a Close Eye
description: BRICS officials have confirmed the development of a gold-standard currency to enable intertrading in the long term. The BRICS movement currently uses the United States dollar to facilitate international trade as it encourages more internal currency use. The upcoming BRICS summit in South Africa has sparked several speculations but mostly revolving around a new currency [...]

title: Ethereum Rival Solana Shrugs Off SEC Attack and FTX Scandal, Set to Outperform Bitcoin
description: Raoul Pal compares Solana’s current trend to Ethereum (ETH) hitting its bottom in 2018, and rallying 47x thereafter. Pal predicts a 20x price rally in Solana which could propel the SOL price all the way to $400. Layer-1 Ethereum-rival Solana (SOL) has recently been in the news and has outperformed all of the top ten [...]

title: Kiyosaki Projects $120k BTC as BRICS Plan to Unveil Gold-backed Crypto
description:
In a recent tweet, renowned author and investor Robert Kiyosaki hinted at an imminent announcement by the BRICS nations, including Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa, regarding a revolutionary gold-backed cryptocurrency. Kiyosaki foresees a significant challenge to the US dollar’s dominance due to the imminent development of the BRICS nations. He also projects a […]

The post Kiyosaki Projects $120k BTC as BRICS Plan to Unveil Gold-backed Crypto appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Crypto Analyst: Binance Is Set to Pump Altcoins This July
description:
According to the blockchain and cryptocurrency educator Ivan Lijeqvist, Binance will make moves that will trigger a pump in the altcoin market this July. In a recent video uploaded on YouTube, Lijeqvist observed the newly launched ARKM token sale on the Binance Launchpad as one of the moves that will trigger the altcoin pump. According […]
